Summary: RED OBJECT(WHITE LIGHT FLASHING ON TOP)?????
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw an object around 1:00 am the morning it was not lighting fast but it was moving at very fast speed.It was a RED OBJECT with from time to time with a white light flashing on top.Now this white light i saw could be just the lights from the firefly or lightining bugs.But all i no is that this thing had no sound and was a all red object shape was probably close to and orb like.
